A

Action - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.entry
Used to record a clinical action that has been performed, which may have been ad hoc, or due to the execution of an Activity in an Instruction workflow.
Activity - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.entry
Defines a single activity within an Instruction, such as a medication administration.
AdminEntry - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.entry
Entry subtype for administrative information, i.e.

C

CareEntry - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.entry
The abstract parent of all clinical `ENTRY` subtypes.
Composition - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.composition
Content of one version in a `VERSIONED_COMPOSITION`.
ContentItem - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.content
Abstract ancestor of all concrete content types.

E

Ehr - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.ehr
The EHR object is the root object and access point of an EHR for a subject of care.
EhrAccess - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.ehr
EHR-wide access control object.
EhrStatus - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.ehr
Single object per EHR containing various EHR-wide status flags and settings, including whether this EHR can be queried, modified etc.
Entry - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.entry
The abstract parent of all `ENTRY` subtypes.
Evaluation - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.entry
Entry type for evaluation statements.
EventContext - Interface in org.openehr.rm.ehr.composition
Documents the context information of a healthcare event involving the subject of care and the health system.
